House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05622
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE RIGHT TO PROTECT ONESELF, FAMILY, PROPERTY AND OTHERS
ABSTRACT : Declares it the policy of the State to guarantee and protect the right of qualified citizens to own and possess firearms; Aims to simplify the redundant firearm application process to encourage new and existing owners to have their firearms licensed; Seeks therefore to merge the License to Own and Possess Firearms (LTOPF) and Permit to Carry Firearm Outside of Residence (PTCFOR) into a single license (LTOPF); Defines several terms among others as “concealed carry” and “open carry”.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TEVES, ARNOLFO JR. A.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-11
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY ON 2017-05-17
